application.name: iContact
application.description:
iContact
A new implementation of iContact by supbro building on the source code release by Larna, with aditional features including Full screen, and a top bar based on A_Cs S2 series.
Check http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?p=2245963 for more info!
Change Log:
0.71 - May 30, 2008
Added new and improved ABC keyboard
Improved physical keyboard support
Added option for exit on close
Added option for exit on action
Improved functionality of virtual scroll bar
Added AppToDate support
0.7 - May 28, 2008
Added skin and color scheme support
Made app "full screen" with titlebar matching A_C's S2P and S2U2
Added call log
Added quick scroll-to support
Tied favorites to built-in categories
Added .cab installer for easy uninstall
Fixed icon to a proper transparent one
0.6 - April 6, 2008
Initial release of Source Code on xda-developers
